hero.title: Falcon Group Logistics
hero.subtitle: Your Trusted Partner in Shipping, Freight & Warehousing
hero.description: With over 20 years of experience in Egypt's maritime ports, we provide comprehensive logistics solutions with international standards for health, safety, and environmental protection.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Comprehensive logistics solutions tailored to your needs

shipping.title: Shipping Services
shipping.description: Professional maritime shipping solutions across all Egyptian ports with full compliance to international standards and regulations.

freight.title: Freight Management
freight.description: Comprehensive freight forwarding and management services for all types of materials and cargo with efficient handling processes.

warehousing.title: Warehousing Solutions
warehousing.description: Secure and modern warehousing facilities equipped with advanced storage systems and professional material handling equipment.

transportation.title: Transportation Services
transportation.description: Reliable transportation services with our large fleet of equipped vehicles ensuring safe and timely delivery of your cargo.

about.title: About Falcon Group
about.description: We have a distinguished history in shipping, freight, warehousing, and transportation operations for all types of materials according to international specifications, with over 20 years of experience in all Egyptian maritime ports and with many national and international investment companies.
about.approach: Our business sector applies a unique approach in performance speed and providing all solutions and alternative solutions for work requirements including equipment, human resources, facilities, warehouses, and a large fleet of equipped transport vehicles.

contact.title: Ready to Get Started?
contact.description: Contact us today to discuss your logistics needs and discover how we can help your business grow.

activities: Unloading and transporting 80,000 tons of cement from Damietta Port to the Halayeb Sudanese outlet.
Unloading and transporting 45,000 tons of packaged cement from Damietta Port to the Argin Sudanese outlet.
Transporting 130,000 tons of bulk sugar from Damietta Port to the Belqas and El Hamoul sugar factories.
Transporting 40,000 tons of bulk sugar from Damietta Port to the Hawamdiya and Fayoum sugar refining factories for Cargill Industries.
Transporting 90,000 tons of bulk beets to the Belqas sugar refining factory.
Transporting 850,000 tons of clinker from the Arab Company Cement Factory to the Port Said Cement Factory for Shoury Holding Company.
Transporting 70,000 tons of packaged cement from the Shoury Port Said factory to all governorates of the Republic.
Transporting 45,000 tons of packaged cement from the Lafarge factory in Suez to all governorates of the Republic.
Contracting with AB shipping line to transport 18,000 containers between the Republic's ports.
Unloading 100,000 tons of clinker from Adabiya Port and transporting it to the Shoury Port Said Cement Factory.
Contracting with Speix Assiut Cement Factory to transport a quantity of 20,000 tons of cement to all governorates of the Republic.
Contracting with Egyptian Railways to transport 1,200,000 tons from the Sherif Basalt Crusher in Minya to the new railway line in El Balina, Sohag.
Contracting with Ascom Cement Company to supply and transport 250,000 tons of agricultural gypsum from the Beni Mazar area in Minya to the ASEC factory in Minya.
Unloading 40,000 tons of sulfur for Kayan Egypt Company and transporting it to Fayoum.
Unloading 20,000 tons of clinker for the Arab Company for Cement Manufacturing and transporting it to the factory in Ain Sokhna.
Contracting with Reliance Logistic Company to transport 8,000 tons of clinker raw material from Ain Sokhna Port to the Arab Company Cement Factory in Sokhna, ASEC Minya, and El Nahda Qena.
Shipping a ton of cement for Lafarge Cement Factory at Adabiya Port.
Contracting with Cairo 3A Company at Damietta Port to transport a fixed annual quantity of 180,000 tons of corn and soybeans from Damietta Port to all governorates of the Republic.
Contracting with El Dakahlia for Poultry Company to transport corn and dicalcium phosphate raw materials from Damietta Port to the company's factories in Dimas, Minya, and Sadat.
Contracting with Misr Beni Suef Cement Factory to transport a quantity of 50,000 tons of packaged cement to Sudan (Khartoum).
Contracting with Beni Suef Cement Factory to transport 25,000 tons of cement to Libya in all its governorates.
Transporting, shipping, and storing 80,000 tons of glass sand for Sinai Mining Company from Zaafarana Abu Zenima to Damietta Port.
Transporting and shipping 6,000 tons of quartz for Reliance Mining Company from Marsa Alam to Alexandria Port.

Contracting with the El Al shipping line to transport empty containers between the ports of the Republic for a year, transporting and shipping 3,000 tons of glass sand from Zaafarana to Damietta Port for Zamzam Mining Company.
Contracting with Elkem Egypt International Mining Company for years to store, transport, and ship the company's quartz raw materials.
Contracting with Reliance Logistic to transport 3,000 tons of coal from Alexandria Port to El Nahda Cement Factory in Qena Governorate.
Storing and shipping 80,000 tons of glass sand for Multi-Min Mining Company at Damietta Port.
Transporting and shipping 5,000 tons of iron oxide from the oases mines to Adabiya Port for Shoury Holding Group, Port Said.
Transporting 120,000 tons of iron oxide from the Abu Rish area in Aswan to the Aswan Cement, El Nahda Qena, and Qena Cement factories.
Contracting with Reliance Logistic Company to transport DF raw material from its factories in Port Said and Ismailia in bulk to the Cemex Assiut, Lafarge Sokhna, and Ameriya Alexandria factories.
Transporting 160,000 tons of tuff from Aswan to the Cleopatra Ceramics factory in Ain Sokhna.
Contracting with Carbon Service Company to transport raw material waste from the Daftra area in El Mahalla El Kubra to the cities of Banha, Tenth of Ramadan, Port Said, and Ismailia.
Transporting 50,000 tons of imported corn for El Dakahlia for Poultry Company from Damietta Port to the company's factories in Dakahlia, Sadat, and Minya.
Transporting a quantity of 10,000 tons of bulk glass sand from Zaafarana to Damietta Port for the Union Mining Company.
Contracting to transport, store, and ship a quantity of 60,000 tons of raw quartz from the Quseir and Marsa Alam mines to Damietta Port for Elkem International Mining Company.
Contracting with Misr Phosphate Company to transport and ship a quantity of phosphate, 450,000 tons of raw phosphate from the company's mines in the السباعية and Edfu areas in Aswan.
Shipping 3,500 containers of monocalcium phosphate.

Contracting with Shoury Holding Company for Cement Industry to transport a quantity of 800,000 tons of raw clinker from the Titan Cement factory in Beni Suef to the Shoury company factory in Port Said.
Contracting with Kayan for Import and Export Company to transport and ship a quantity of 500,000 tons of raw clinker on board a vessel.
Contracting with Horus for Industrial Development and Import and Export Company to unload and store a quantity of 300,000 tons of Ukrainian corn at Damietta Port.
Contracting with Horus Company to unload, store, and transport a quantity of 430,000 tons of Argentinean corn at Falcon warehouses in Damietta Port.

Contracting with the Financial Company for Fertilizer Manufacturing to transport a quantity of phosphate raw material from East السباعية, Um Hagara area in Aswan, 250,000 tons, to the Suez Fertilizer Factory in Ain Sokhna.
Contracting with Kayan for Import and Export Company to unload, store, transport, and ship a quantity of 80,000 tons of agricultural sulfur raw material at the military pier in Ain Sokhna.
